articles.description: Centre Manu Tuilagi has been included in England's initial 36-man squad preparing to face Scotland in the Six Nations at Murrayfield on 24 February.
articles.title: Tuilagi included in England squad to face Scotland

articles.description: Forty years ago, Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean gambled a shot at Olympic gold on a radical routine. It paid off handsomely, but their virtuoso performance is not a template for modern ice dancers.
articles.title: How Torvill and Dean chose heart over head and changed a sport

articles.description: Ben Stokes' journey to 100 Tests has been one of the most compelling stories in British sport, writes Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: 'Stokes is Botham and Brearley rolled into one'

articles.description: As Paris St-Germain host Real Sociedad in the Champions League, they can look at their opponents as a blueprint for homegrown success.
articles.title: How PSG may find blueprint for future in La Real

articles.description: Kenyan marathon runner Sarah Chepchirchir is handed an eight-year ban for violating anti-doping regulations for a second time.
articles.title: Sarah Chepchirchir: Kenyan handed eight-year ban for doping violation

articles.description: Mercedes' new Formula 1 car is a "complete relaunch" as they try to recover from two difficult years, team principal Toto Wolff says.
articles.title: Mercedes: W15 had a 'complete relaunch' says Toto Wolff

articles.description: Mark Wood is recalled to the England side for the third Test against India in Rajkot as the tourists select two seamers for the first time in the series.
articles.title: Wood back as England pick two seamers for third Test

articles.description: Jayson Tatum scores 41 points in a dazzling display as the Boston Celtics beat the Brooklyn Nets 118-110 to extend their lead at the top of the NBA's Eastern Conference.
articles.title: NBA: Jayson Tatum dazzles in 41-point performance as Boston Celtics beat Brooklyn Nets

articles.description: Chief executive Zak Brown warns there is "a lot of work still to do" as McLaren unveil their new car.
articles.title: McLaren: Zak Brown 'realistic' about 2024 as team launch new MCL38 car

articles.description: Four-time major winner Naomi Osaka goes through in Qatar Open to reach the quarter-finals of a tournament for the first time in almost two years.
articles.title: Naomi Osaka: Former world number one reaches last eight of a tournament for first time since 2022
